content: 45 47 47 row row 10 k1 * k1 yo 4 times ssk p1 5 times k1 yo or until armhole measures approx 8 5 9 9 9 5 10 10 5 4 times repeat from * to last 2 sts k2 from bobble row row 11 p2 *p8 k1 p1 5 times p8 repeat from * to transfer left front sts to stitch holder last st p1 row 12 k1 *k8 ssk 5 times k8 repeat from * to last right front 2 sts k2 transfer held sts to needle join yarn on rs and knit 1 row 13 p2 *p8 wrap p9 repeat from * to last st p1 row bobble 2 3 4 5 6 7 sts at beginning of next ws row row 14 knit then decrease 1 st at armhole edge every ws row repeat row 1 14 oh my © 2023 angeline webb all rights reserved 2 3 4 5 7 8 9 times as follows p2tog p to end not have the correct number of sts you may increase or 18 20 22 24 26 28 sts on needle decrease sts on the first row to obtain the correct number continue stockinette st even for 46 46 44 44 46 46 row or until armhole measures approx 8 5 9 9 9 5 10 10 5 row 1 knit 1 row from bobble row transfer right front sts to stitch holder shape collar collar is shaped with short-row closing gaps as you back come to them since collar is worn folded over ws of transfer held sts to needle join yarn on rs collar means the rs of body will be facing you bobble 2 3 4 5 6 7 sts at beginning of next two row then decrease 1 st at each armhole edge every rs row begin k2p2 rib and work short row 3 4 5 7 8 9 times as follows ssk k to last 2 sts k2tog short row 1 & 2 work 1 st past marker #2 turn work 70 76 80 82 86 92 sts on needle jsl1 work to 1 st past marker #1 turn work markers continue stockinette st even for 47 47 45 45 47 47 row may now be removed or until armholes measure approx 8 5 9 9 9 5 10 10 5 short row 3 jsl1 jw1 k2 turn work from bobble row ending after a ws row repeat short row 3 until all sts have been worked note rs k18 20 22 24 26 28 sts bobble 34 36 36 34 34 36 neck depending on the number of sts you picked up you may sts k to end not end right at the last st if you wish on your last 2 row you may adjust the number of sts worked before join shoulders turning arrange front and back shoulder sts on two needles with rs facing each other using 3-needle bind off join work even until collar measures
